• Tinymesh Cloud Docs
  • HTTP API - v2
  • Organizations
  • PUT /organization/:org

PUT /organization/:org

https://http.cloud.tiny-mesh.com/v2/organization/:org
200 OK – Returns the updated organization object
400 Bad Request – Returns a error object when input was invalid or malformed, or any of the users defined does not exist
401 Unauthorized – When no, or invalid, authentication was given error object
403 Forbidden – Returns a error object when authentication gives no access to the organization
404 Not Found – Returns a error object when trying to update a non-existing organization

URL Parameters

  • :org – The key of the organization resource

Description

Updates the organization resource with parameters from request body.

If succesfull a partial update to the organization resource will be done. The updated object will be returned.
